mapper.insert: insert into report_infectious (id, hosp_code, profile_id, visit_id, baby_id, bus_type_code, report_no, report_type_code, visit_name, family_name, cert_code, cert_no, gender_code, birthday, age, age_unit_code, work_unit, phone, belong_code, live_code, live_addre, live_addre_detail, pop_class_code, other_pop_exp, record_type_code, attack_type_code, attack_date, diagnosis_date, die_date, infectious_type_no, infectious_code, monitor_std_no, monitor_code, route_infection_code, marry_code, education_code, revision, refund_cause, report_unit, fill_dept_id, fill_dept, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, audit_status, audit_id, audit_name, audit_time) values ( #{id}, #{hospCode}, #{profileId}, #{visitId}, #{babyId}, #{busTypeCode}, #{reportNo}, #{reportTypeCode}, #{visitName}, #{familyName}, #{certCode}, #{certNo}, #{genderCode}, #{birthday}, #{age}, #{ageUnitCode}, #{workUnit}, #{phone}, #{belongCode}, #{liveCode}, #{liveAddress}, #{liveAdderssDetail}, #{popClassCode}, #{otherPopExp}, #{recordTypeCode}, #{attackTypeCode}, #{attackDate}, #{diagnosisDate}, #{dieDate}, #{infectiousTypeNo}, #{infectiousCode}, #{monitorStdNo}, #{monitorCode}, #{routeInfectionCode}, #{marryCode}, #{educationCode}, #{revision}, #{refuseReason}, #{reportUnit}, #{fillDeptId}, #{fillDept}, #{remark}, #{creatId}, #{creatName}, now(), #{auditStatusCode}, #{auditId}, #{auditName}, #{auditTime} )
